name: Mochi Love Story
description:
It is St. Valentine's day- Mochi is on his way to his beloved Nashi. 

But on the way he meets a playful white kitty who just decided to follow him!

The mother of the kitty though is the alpha cat of this neighbourhood and very protective of her children. So don't fall pray to kitty's beautiful eyes and keep distance of her! Once you get too close to her the mother will be mad! And she really has an appetite for delicious mochis! 

Try to survive 30 seconds and get as many presents for your love as possible!

Have fun! ^-^
